net.gini.android.vision.ui

Class CustomFontTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextView
      • net.gini.android.vision.ui.CustomFontTextView

  • public class CustomFontTextView
extends TextView
    Custom TextView with an additional 'font' attribute. System font names or font file paths (full path in the assets folder) can be used. 
     
    <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
       xmlns:gini="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
       android:layout_width="match_parent"
       android:layout_height="match_parent"
       android:orientation="vertical">

       <net.gini.android.vision.ui.CustomFontTextView
           android:id="@+id/giniTextView"
           android:layout_width="wrap_content"
           android:layout_height="wrap_content"
           gini:font="sans-serif-light" />
   </LinearLayout>
 
     
  <net.gini.android.vision.ui.CustomFontTextView
      gini:font="myFonts/Cave-Story.ttf" />
